item.title: Nathan add a quote by Elizabeth Strout
item.description: "People like to think the younger generation's job is to steer the world to hell. But it's never true, is it? They're hopeful and good - and that's how it should be." -- Elizabeth Strout

item.title: Nathan add a quote by Curtis Sittenfeld
item.description: "It is not a camera, or a reporter that makes something real and genuine; more often a camera or a reporter does the opposite." -- Curtis Sittenfeld

item.title: Nathan add a quote by Flannery O'Connor
item.description: "...I have to write to discover what I am doing. Like the old lady, I don't know so well what I think until I see what I say; then I have to say it again." -- Flannery O'Connor

item.title: Nathan add a quote by Brock Clarke
item.description: "You can never tell how you sound over the phone, that evil piece of machinery, and I would stop using one, we all would, if only there weren't these great distances we need to put between us and the people we need to talk to." -- Brock Clarke

item.title: Nathan add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Everyone should be able to do one card trick, tell two jokes, and recite three poems, in case they are ever trapped in an elevator." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Nathan add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Experience is merely the name men gave to their mistakes." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Nathan add a quote by Justin Evans
Nathan add a quote by Jess Walter
item.description: "Sometimes what we want to do and what we must do are not the same. Pasquo, the smaller the space between your desire and what is right, the happier you will be." -- Jess Walter

item.title: Nathan add a quote by Jess Walter
item.description: "A writer needs four things to achieve greatness, Pasquale: desire, disappointment, and the sea.” “That’s only three.” Alvis finished his wine. “You have to do disappointment twice." -- Jess Walter

item.title: Nathan add a quote by Jess Walter
item.description: "This is what happens when you live in dreams, he thought: you dream this and you dream that and you sleep right through your life." -- Jess Walter

item.title: Nathan add a quote by Reif Larsen
item.description: "Adults were pack rats of old, useless emotions." -- Reif Larsen

item.title: Nathan add a quote by Kevin Brockmeier
item.description: "Worry is a mean-faced dwarf who beats on your heart like a kettledrum." -- Kevin Brockmeier

item.title: Nathan add a quote by Kevin Brockmeier
item.description: "You could not presume that people were healthy. You could not presume that they would welcome the little nudges and jostlings of life. You had to behave as though everyone you met was walking a thin wire far above the earth, where the slightest wind might rock them off their balance and send them tumbling to the ground." -- Kevin Brockmeier

item.title: Nathan add a quote by Jhumpa Lahiri
item.description: "She had preferred being on the plane, detached from the earth, the illusion of sitting still." -- Jhumpa Lahiri
